techniques.procedure: Threat actor sent macro-enabled Excel file via spoofed email
techniques.evidence: Email gateway logs, SMTP headers, attachment metadata

techniques.procedure: Finance employee opened attachment and enabled macro execution
techniques.evidence: Endpoint logs showing Excel process launching macro

techniques.procedure: Macro code obfuscated to evade signature-based detection
techniques.evidence: High entropy in attachment, sandbox detonation results

techniques.procedure: RAT established C2 beacon over HTTPS port 443
techniques.evidence: Proxy logs, DNS queries, HTTPS connections from non-browser processes
TLS certificate inspection, encrypted traffic analysis

techniques.procedure: Attacker used compromised third-party mail server as relay
techniques.evidence: Source IP threat intelligence, mail server reputation checks
